Archetype-Herbalist -- Male Changeling Human Fighter: 10

Background: Emissary Deity: Pharasma

Changeling Heritage: Has the changeling trait and may take changeling ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Alcohol Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Gladitorial Lore: +20 (intelligence; master) Society: +16 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Stealth: +16 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +14 (strength; trained) Medicine: +15 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +15 (wisdom; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Gladitorial Lore): Skill Master (Gladitorial Lore)
Advanced Herbalism: Has increased Advanced Alchemy effects
Battlefield Surveyor: Perception Master
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 7 from any)
Herbalist Dedication: Has the Advanced Alchemy feature/Skill Expert (Nature)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Tea Lore): Skill Trained (Tea Lore)
Advanced Alchemy: Can create 6 consumable infused alchemical items of up to level 10 without a Crafting check during daily prep
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 22 on Athletics checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Endemic Herbs: Herbal items also give environment-specific benefits: +1 Fortitude for 1 min (aquatic); 1 step less severe cold for 1 hr (arctic); 1 step less severe heat (desert); +2 saves vs. disease and poison for 1 min (forest); +1 Reflex for 1 min (mountain); +1 Will for 1 min (plains); remove a source of persistent bleed damage (swamp); +1 Perception for 1 min (underground)
Fresh Ingredients: +4 to use Natural Medicine with fresh herbs to Treat Wounds in the wilderness, or +2 elsewhere
Herbalist Dedication: Can create 4 alchemical healing consumables in the wilderness, or 2 elsewhere, during daily prep, and can use Nature to craft them
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Poultice Preparation: Can make herbal items to be applied externally that also allow an immediate flat check to recover from persistent acid, bleed, or fire damage
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bastard Sword (+16 1d8+2 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Longbow (+18 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Maul (+16 1d12+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Spears): Attack Master (Simple Spears; Martial Spears)/Attack Expert (Advanced Spears)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Temple Sword)
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level during daily prep
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 6 available vs. 5 allocated
